definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="hookent" type="Entity">hookent</variable><variable id="Damageent" type="Entity">Damageent</variable><variable id="itmstk" type="MCItem">itmstk</variable></variables><block deletable="false" inline="false" type="event_trigger" x="-1" y="-3"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_item</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">在抛竿时可以触发</comment><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:itmstk</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:SharpHook</field><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:itmstk</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"/><field name="procedure">HookLoading</field><field name="name0">EnchantLevel</field><field name="name1">LoadingTime</field><value name="arg0"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:SharpHook</field><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:itmstk</field></block></value></block></value><value name="arg1"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
